== Main inclusion report for pycairo ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/p/pycairo/, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' optional build-depends for pygtk (GTK 2.7/2.8 uses cairo, pygtk 2.7/2.8 uses pycairo)

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No binaries.

4. ''QA:''
* Only a library, example currently does not work due to build dependency circle with pygtk.
* Bugs: package not in Debian, 1 upstream bug about an old build issue fixed with current version.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met.
* Standard debhelper packaging.

6. ''Dependencies:''
